```{r}
bostonArea <- bostonCustom
bostonArea
```

LDA

```{r}
set.seed(343)

shuffleRows <- sample(nrow(bostonArea))
bostonArea <- bostonArea[shuffleRows,]
train <- sample(nrow(bostonArea)*.80)
bostonTrain <- bostonArea[train,]
bostonTest <- bostonArea[-train,]

length(unique(bostonArea$area))
length(unique(bostonTrain$area))
length(unique(bostonTest$area))
```


```{r}
lda.fit <- lda(area ~year+ totalrooms + saleprice + rentprice + pricetype + type, data = bostonTrain)
lda.fit
```

```{r}
lda.pred <- predict(lda.fit, bostonTest)

lda.class <- lda.pred$class
options(max.print = 999999999)
table(observed = bostonTest$area,predicted = lda.class)
```


```{r}
misclassRate <- mean(lda.class != bostonTest$area)
misclassRate
```


```{r}
options(max.print = 999999999)
table(observed = bostonTest$target_no, predicted = yhat.rf)
```


QDA


```{r}
qda.fit <- MASS::qda(area ~year+ totalrooms + saleprice + rentprice + pricetype + type, data = bostonTrain)
qda.fit
```
